name: NSUbiquitousKeyValueStore
desc: An iCloud-based container of key-value pairs you use to share data among instances of your app running on a user's connected devices.

items.name: class var `default`: NSUbiquitousKeyValueStore
items.desc: Returns the shared iCloud key-value store object.

items.name: func array(forKey: String) -> [Any]?
items.desc: Returns the array associated with the specified key.

items.name: func bool(forKey: String) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns the Boolean value associated with the specified key.

items.name: func data(forKey: String) -> Data?
items.desc: Returns the data object associated with the specified key.

items.name: func dictionary(forKey: String) -> [String : Any]?
items.desc: Returns the dictionary object associated with the specified key.

items.name: func double(forKey: String) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the double value associated with the specified key.

items.name: func longLong(forKey: String) -> Int64
items.desc: Returns the long long value associated with the specified key.

items.name: func object(forKey: String) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the object associated with the specified key.

items.name: func string(forKey: String) -> String?
items.desc: Returns the string associated with the specified key.

items.name: func set([Any]?, forKey: String)
items.desc: Sets an array object for the specified key in the key-value store.

items.name: func set(Bool, forKey: String)
items.desc: Sets a Boolean value for the specified key in the key-value store.

items.name: func set(Data?, forKey: String)
items.desc: Sets a data object for the specified key in the key-value store.

items.name: func set([String : Any]?, forKey: String)
items.desc: Sets a dictionary object for the specified key in the key-value store.

items.name: func set(Double, forKey: String)
items.desc: Sets a double value for the specified key in the key-value store.

items.name: func set(Int64, forKey: String)
items.desc: Sets a long long value for the specified key in the key-value store.

items.name: func set(Any?, forKey: String)
items.desc: Sets an object for the specified key in the key-value store.

items.name: func set(String?, forKey: String)
items.desc: Sets a string object for the specified key in the key-value store.

items.name: func synchronize() -> Bool
items.desc: Explicitly synchronizes in-memory keys and values with those stored on disk.

items.name: func removeObject(forKey: String)
items.desc: Removes the value associated with the specified key from the key-value store.

items.name: var dictionaryRepresentation: [String : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary containing all of the key-value pairs in the key-value store.

items.name: class let didChangeExternallyNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted when the value of one or more keys in the local key-value store changed due to incoming data pushed from iCloud.
